title: Rune page change name bug
body: Today I got some new runes pages and I found that I was not able to change the name of the rune pages, no matter how I add or delete the runes in the page, the name still not change. I have try several time both in mt computer and my GF's computer, same issue.

replies.body: So I've figured out you have to hit Enter when changing the rune page name, for it to take effect.  Doing anything else to navigate away from the rune page name text box will revert the name.
I am experiencing this bug as well

Hey there,

Could you please run a repair on your client, see [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) guide for steps on how to run the repair.

Let me know if this helps.
After repair the client, it still doesn't work :(

This might sound silly, are you sure you're saving your rune pages after you rename them?

Are you attempting to use any non-standard characters in the name of the rune page?

This is what I do to test, pick up a random page, for example 'support ap melee', remove a rune from the page, change the name in the edit box, such as '1234', then re-add it to the page,  after that the name go back to 'support ap melee'
